Text.Page:
There's another argon here, directing the avengers and reporting up the chain.

Unless you want an argon rescue squad jumping you, spill its big, blue, commanding guts before you hit the altar.

And take its staff. I think that's how it controls the avengers.

You got him?

Good. Those things can report in over great distances. Offing it buys you time to stop the ceremonies.

And this staff's going to teach me how the argons communicate!
The argon's named Gelgatum. Hunt around on the Raven Altar.
